CustomField.formula: IF( OR( AND( OR( ISPICKVAL(Origin, "Twitter"), ISPICKVAL(Origin, "Instagram"), ISPICKVAL(Origin, "Facebook")), Response_Time_Minutes__c > 0 && Response_Time_Minutes__c <= 15 ), AND( ISPICKVAL(Origin, "Email"), Response_Time_Minutes__c > 0 && Response_Time_Minutes__c <= 60 ), AND( OR( ISPICKVAL(Origin, "Appstore"), ISPICKVAL(Origin, "Playstore"), ISPICKVAL(Origin, "YouTube") ), Response_Time_Minutes__c > 0 && Response_Time_Minutes__c <= 1440 ) ), TRUE, FALSE )
CustomField.label: Achieve response time v2
